com.att.android.arodatacollector.main

Class AROCollectorTaskManagerListAdapters.ProcessListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.att.android.arodatacollector.main.AROCollectorTaskManagerListAdapters.ProcessListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    AROCollectorTaskManagerListAdapters

    public static final class AROCollectorTaskManagerListAdapters.ProcessListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Represents a custom list adapter for the ARO Data Collector task killer that contains a list of processes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes a new instance of the AROCollectorTaskManagerListAdapters.ProcessListAdapter class using the specified application context and list of processes.

        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        detailProcesslist - An array containing the list of processes.
        mApp - The application class to which the list should be added.

    • Method Detail

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Gets the total number of rows in the task killer.
        Returns:
        An int, that is the total number of task killer rows.

      • getItem

        public java.lang.Object getItem(int position)
        Gets the Task Manager item at the specified index position.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the Task Manager item to return.
        Returns:

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int position)
        Gets the ID of the Task Manager item for the specified index position.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the Task Manager item.
        Returns:
        The ID of the specified Task Manager item.

      • killSelectedTasks

        public void killSelectedTasks()
        Kills the currently selected task killer tasks.

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                        android.view.View convertView,
                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Returns a list view for the specified task killer row that contains the specified items.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the list row.
        convertView - The view object containing list row items.
        parent - The parent view that the specified view should be added to.
        Returns:
        A View object containing a list of view of the task killer row.
